about_the_game:
You wake up in a primeval forest where chaos reigns. You remember nothing.

All around you is wild nature and a threat with every step. Are you alone, or were you lucky enough to find allies? Your fate hangs in the balance, and the decisions you make may be the key to survival... or death.

The world is going crazy.

Nature goes berserk under the influence of unknown forces, strange anomalies fill the world. Hungry predators are already on your trail! But the world is full of equally lost and frightened individuals, and it's only up to you to decide whether you'll make a friend or a new enemy. Tame animals, make gifts, trade, and engage in dialogue with the inhabitants, or attack everyone and everything, your choice will change your carma!

Fight, explore, create!

Explore the world and use invaluable artifacts that alter genetic structure. How much will you have to change, and will you still be able to call yourself human? Seek resources, build, and create useful tools. Only a comprehensive approach will allow you to survive and unravel the mystery of what's happening around. But the wild nature is cruel and uncompromising, so try to be careful and not get into trouble, because you only have one life. Be responsible for your actions and learn to accept defeat! Harsh reality with no option to reboot events!

Are you up for the challenge?

Developer words:

The world of «Wild Script: Nature» is just a seedling, waiting for your touch to flourish. This isn't just a game, it's a shared canvas, a journey we embark on together.

As a solo developer, my passion fuels this project, but I know the true magic lies in community. Every voice matters. What monsters do you imagine lurking in the shadows? What secrets should be unearthed? Share your ideas, your hopes, your fears with me at support email.

Let's build something extraordinary, step by step. Join the adventure, and let's craft a game that's truly ours.

Because in the end, we're all just players in the same game, united by the power of imagination.

Friendly community is our goal!

Game features:

  • Procedural world, enemy, and event generation, making each adventure unique!

  • Combat system based on pure physics!

  • Fun procedural animation and symbolic, author's low-poly graphics, giving room for your imagination.

  • An inexplicable world of wild nature filled with anomalies, mysteries, and randomness.

  • A multitude of weapon, armor, and, most importantly, mystical artifact variations!

  • Base building, arrangement, and management.

  • Random story for each character.

  • Player carma system.

  • Author's text quests with decision-making and group characteristic checks.

  • Knowledge tablets requiring deciphering, telling the story of the world.

content_descriptors.notes: All violence is hyperbolic, comical and unrealistic. The puppet just lost its strings.
